txt.en: 'There are more threats in the North Trollshaws than just spiders, [placeholder]. Cave-claws have come down out of the Misty Mountains, infesting the gorges to the south. They are foul vermin, which have before only been troublesome to dwarves and Orcs, but now they defile the very stone of our lands.\n\n'Would you help us by hunting the vile creatures?'
Cave-claws have come down out of the Misty Mountains, plaguing the North Trollshaws.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. Alas, there are some living creatures which do more harm than good.'
Cave-claws can be found in the North Trollshaws, in the gorges south of Thoroniel's encampment.\n\nThoroniel has asked you and your companions to hunt the foul cave-claws of the North Trollshaws.
Defeat cave-claws in the North Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated cave-claws in the North Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thoroniel is posted north of the cave-claw infested gorges in the North Trollshaws.\n\nYou should return to Thoroniel and let her know that you have done as she has asked.
